name: Sour Land
description: Sour Land (a.k.a. Sour Patch Kids) is a sativa-dominant crossing of Sour Diesel and Candyland. Created by Dark Heart Nursery, Sour Land emits a pungent aroma of diesel and sweet earth. This strain’s effects tend to be happy and uplifting, making it well-suited for consumers suffering from stress and depression. Sour Land grows in a similar fashion to Candyland, expressing tangled golden stigmas and subtle purple hues in its dense, frosty foliage.
descriptionPlain: Sour Land (a.k.a. Sour Patch Kids) is a sativa-dominant crossing of Sour Diesel and Candyland. Created by Dark Heart Nursery, Sour Land emits a pungent aroma of diesel and sweet earth. This strain’s effects tend to be happy and uplifting, making it well-suited for consumers suffering from stress and depression. Sour Land grows in a similar fashion to Candyland, expressing tangled golden stigmas and subtle purple hues in its dense, frosty foliage.

highlightedReviews.text: Its hits hard and has a lot of visible keef
